title: Attendance
content: My attendance in 3 subjects is very low like around 50% I'm in P cycle. Am i totally f**ked and they won't let me write esa ?

comments.body: 50% is too low, even for the hard margin of 75%. Did you just skip every other day of class? You'll definitely stand out in the list of people with low attendance. Usually there are makeup classes after all the ISAs end. If you can cover up to a satisfactory degree they'll let you write the ESA, else you're kinda screwed.
There's still a month you might get to 75%.Pay some private doc for a forged illness certificate.
Get it above 60 percent immediately.. u can then.. ask for some relaxation.. of the 80% rule, please attend all remaining classes

I’ve always had an attendance of around 60-70% in every subject, some odd ones here and there 50-60% but never really more than 70%. Don’t stress too much, you’ll likely be called and asked why your attendance is this way, produce medical certificates and you’ll be fine. Take part in club activities or something to claim attendance.
